thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by Maura

author: Maura
title: Maura
text: Ordered the product I wanted with great savings and cheaper than anywhere else. Very prompt delivery as I received it the next day. Would definitely recommend the shower doctor as I have shopped with them on multiple occasions and they have never let me down and they sell quality products
